resources.string: The phone is in silent mode! Notification vibration and sound will be supressed.
Blink the LED lights during the notification.
Clear notification automatically after a few seconds.
Select the theme for the visualization
When the phone is set to silent show a nag dialog.
Don\'t allow the phone to go to sleep.
Button repeats per second on long press in the number picker.

TeaTimer will help you make sure your tea is there on time, not too early, not too late.\n\nTea Timer is a free software (as in free speech, not as in free beer), you can also use it for your spaghetti.

TeaTimer is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or any later version.
Get the latest version of the source code on Github.
